explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a woman in a pink bathrobe stands, looking down at the mug in her hand. Kitchen appliances such as a microwave oven and a storage rack next to the refrigerator can be seen in the background, with various foods and seasonings on it.

[0-6] First, the woman in the pink bathrobe raises her right hand to cover her mouth and yawns. A little boy in a blue shirt and carrying a red backpack walks into the kitchen from the right. He looks forward, then turns around and reaches out his hand behind him. The camera zooms in as a right hand takes a Snickers bar from a fruit basket on the right. The boy in blue turns to the right. The woman in the pink bathrobe reaches out with her left hand, stops him by placing her hand on his shoulder, and pulls him back with a smile. The boy in blue opens his hands and looks at the woman in the pink bathrobe. The woman in the pink bathrobe puts her mug on the table next to her with her left hand.
